name: Winslow SHAW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Shaw v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Winslow SHAW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Barbara L. Christie, John Jason Talabar, PA. Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 101
Winslow SHAW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 31 EAP 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 16, 2012.
Winslow Shaw, pro se.
Barbara L. Christie, John Jason Talabar, PA. Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
